thread.title: Great experience at a chic hotel with excellent service.
thread.title_full: Great experience at a chic hotel with excellent service. - Review of Kimpton Hotel Eventi, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MATTHEW D
title: Great experience at a chic hotel with excellent service.
text:
Stayed in NYC for a short weekend getaway. Had a great experience. The room was bigger than expected (for NYC standards for the price), and loved the chic decor. It was our first time staying there, but it seemed new and fresh. Comfy pillows/bed, and big bathroom too. Had a nice wine happy hour to start our night. Couldn't go wrong, and would definitely go back.
